###Q1 Generating normal random variables

####a: Using central limit theorem
```{r}
Nsims = 50000
Nvec = numeric(Nsims)
for(i in 1: Nsims){
  N = sum(runif(12)) - 6
  Nvec[i] = N
}
length(Nvec)
hist(Nvec)
```

####b: Using Box Muller

```{r}
Nvec = numeric(Nsims)
for(i in 1: Nsims){
  u1 = runif(1)
  u2 = runif(1)
  r = sqrt(-2 * log(u1))
  theta = 2 * pi * u2
  x = r * cos(theta)
  y = r * sin(theta)
  Nvec[i] = x
  Nvec[i+1] = y
  i = i + 2
}
length(Nvec)
hist(Nvec)
```
